Kala Nirvana

Join us for an exciting talent showcase that celebrates diverse creativity!

Event Details

Performance Format:

Each participant will perform a single act demonstrating their talent.

Performance Setup:

Participants are permitted to use personal props, instruments, and pre-recorded music, with minimal setup time.

Rules & Regulations

  • Performances are individual.
  • Maximum of 5 participants from a college is permitted.
  • Time limit is 5 minutes (4 minutes for the act + 1 minute for setup).
  • All performances must be appropriate for a general audience; acts with explicit or offensive content will be disqualified.
  • Participants must handle their own costumes, props, and instruments.
  • Any required music tracks must be submitted 24 hours before the event.
  • Participants should arrive 30 minutes before their scheduled performance time.

Judging Criteria

  • Creativity and originality: How unique and innovative the performance is.
  • Stage presence: The participant's engagement with the audience.
  • Judgeâ€™s decision: The decision made by the judges will be final.
